laboratory_examinations.findings: Preoperatively, fibrinogen level was increased to >1 g/L before anesthesia. Postoperatively on the fourth day, fibrinogen level was 0.3 g/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fibrinogen levels were monitored and showed a minimum of 0.3 g/L and a peak at 1.4 g/L during the patientâ€™s recovery period. Levels varied according to treatment adjustments.
